item.title: ‘The Long Walk’ Review: Francis Lawrence’s Stephen King Adaptation Is Bleak, Bruising and Emotionally Affecting
item.description: The ‘Hunger Games’ helmer adapts one of King’s grimmest novels, with Cooper Hoffman, David Jonsson, Judy Greer and Mark Hamill starring.

item.title: ‘The Dead of Winter’ Review: Emma Thompson Warms the Frozen Heart of an Icy, Generic Thriller
item.description: Emma Thompson’s palpable aura of capability and down-to-earth shrewdness has seldom been better deployed than in “The Dead of Winter.” Without the star channelling the blunt good sen
